scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.build:dist: shx mkdir -p dist && shx cp -r server tmp-build && rimraf tmp-build/node_modules tmp-build/data tmp-build/logs tmp-build/public && shx cp -rf tmp-build/. dist && rimraf tmp-build && cd dist && npm i --omit=dev && shx cp -r ../client/dist public
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:dist
scripts.package: npm run build && rimraf release.zip && jszip -o release.zip dist/
scripts.start: cd server && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node index.js
scripts.start:dist: cd dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node index.js
